lines.text:
[regarding the formula with which they'll poison Los Angeles's water supply, unless the Governor of California meets their demands]
... Is the concentration LETHAL?
I'd say WORSE!

[Ragnar has captured Drew after killing the spy's partner]
... A program disk was stolen from me, Stargrove. I believe you've got it.
Come on. This is stupid.
You're right. It's VERY stupid. Assuming, of course, you want to see your son.
What kind of designer-drug are you on? How is Lance mixed up in all this?
You know, oddly enough, I wasn't sure he WAS... until now.
Lance doesn't have a clue about my work!
Nor did his mother, but that didn't save her.
You're threatening to KILL Lance!
I'm not THREATENING, Stargrove. I'm PROMISING to kill him, unless I get that disk.
...Ragnar, I've lost too much blood for your games.
Stargrove, you're about to lose a lot more.
[kills him with a shotgun]
I've figured out how to access their computers to re-channel radioactive waste so it goes from Diablo Canyon... into their *drinking water*.
[Ragnar's henchmen look at each other in confusion]
Poison the water supply!
[shouts]
I'm gonna poison their water supply! For gold! For ransom! For jewels! For money!
[laughs maniacally]
